title: Thrilling Wildlife Getaway with Jeep Ride and Bush Dinner
description: Feel at one with nature at the Syna Tiger Resort, Bandhavgarh. Located deep within the Indian jungle, home to beautiful Bengal tigers, you’ll be staying in a luxury cottage, decorated to reflect Indian tribal culture. Your Escapes Club stay includes daily breakfast, lunch and dinner, a daily alcoholic drink per person, a thrilling Jeep drive around the buffer zone and a decadent bush dinner for two.
offer_address: Tala, Bandhavgarh National Park, Manpur, Umaria, Madhya Pradesh 484661, India

title: Exciting Bandhavgarh Wildlife Escape with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Get close to the action of India's Bandhavgarh National Park with a stay at Syna Tiger Resort, a secluded haven located just 200 metres from the famous reserve. Hidden within 85 acres of lush estate in Bandhavgarh, Madhya Pradesh, this wildly beautiful retreat is perfect for nature lovers.

Make the most of this incredible escape with all-inclusive meals (daily breakfast, lunch and dinner), nightly alcoholic drinks for two (one drink per person), a complimentary jeep drive around the buffer zone with packed meals, and a private bush dining experience for two per stay.
offer_address: Tala, Bandhavgarh National Park, Manpur, Umaria, Madhya Pradesh 484661

title: Wildlife Resort near Bandhavgarh National Park with All-Inclusive Meals, Daily Drinks & Guided Nature Walk
description:
With 20 luxurious cottages scattered across the exotic wilderness of Bandhavgarh, Syna Tiger Resort is one of the best wildlife retreats in Madhya Pradesh and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor.

Sharing boundaries with one of India's most famous tiger reserves, Syna Tiger Resort is just 200 metres from the main gate of Bandhavgarh National Park. Perfect for wildlife enthusiasts and nature lovers, this wild paradise is a cocoon of luxury and privacy. Onsite, savour multi-culinary delights at the restaurant, spend tranquil moments by the swimming pool, or simply lose yourself in the unique landscape of Bandhavgarh with nature walks, safaris, village tours and more. If it's Bandhavgarh you seek, don't look beyond Syna Tiger Resort.
offer_address: Tala, Bandhavgarh National Park, Manpur, Umaria, Madhya Pradesh India 484661

title: Bandhavgarh Wildlife Escape with Daily All-Inclusive Dining & Guided Nature Walk
description:
One of the best resorts in Bandhavgarh, Syna Tiger Resort is just 200 metres from the well-known Bandhavgarh National Park, making it a must-visit for all wildlife lovers. This resort, which won the Travellers' Choice Award from Tripadvisor in 2022, offers you pure jungle luxury in a natural setting. The resort boasts 20 beautiful cottages scattered across a natural forested estate of 85 acres, making your dreams of enjoying a relaxing escape in nature come true. Allow the restaurant to pamper your taste buds with carefully prepared and lip-smacking meals throughout your stay and enjoy thrilling safaris in Bandhavgarh and try your luck spotting some tigers. 

Enjoy tranquil nature hikes in the area, attend a wildlife screening to learn everything there is to know about Bandhavgarh's animals, or have some memorable evenings by the bonfire... the choices are aplenty. Get, set, roar!
offer_address: Tala, Bandhavgarh National Park, Manpur, Umaria, Madhya Pradesh 484661  India

vendor_name: Rosa Bandhavgarh Meadows Tiger Safari Lodge
title: Bandhavgarh National Park Wildlife Escape with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Wake up to birds chirping and the growl of tigers at Rosa Bandhavgarh Meadows Tiger Safari Lodge, located on the fringe of the famous Bandhavgarh National Park, renowned for having the highest density of tigers in the country. An oasis of luxury and wilderness, this secluded resort is surrounded by the lush forests of Tala in Madhya Pradesh and is ideal for nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts. It's time to experience the wilderness in all its glory at this jungle lodge that perfectly captures the spirit of nature.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Don't worry about a thing with all-inclusive meals: daily breakfast, lunch and dinner at O-Bite
- Enjoy one nightly mocktail per person at Gol Ghar
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi (limited access)

**Travelling with family?** One child aged six years and under stays free in existing bedding with all inclusions.
location_description: Rosa Bandhavgarh Meadows Tiger Safari Lodge
offer_address: Village Bijaria, Tala, Bandhavgarh, Madhya Pradesh 484661
